=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

DECOMPRESS <object_id>
  - Allows a compressed object to return to its normal size.
  - Example: DECOMPRESS device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.
  - Example: OPEN device_1

PAIR <object_id>
  - Establishes a wireless connection (e.g., Bluetooth) with another device.
  - Example: PAIR device_1

PLUG_IN <object_id>
  - Plugs a device into a power outlet or port.
  - Example: PLUG_IN device_1

TURN_OFF <object_id>
  - Turns off a device.
  - Example: TURN_OFF device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

UNMUTE <object_id>
  - Restores sound to a muted device.
  - Example: UNMUTE device_1

UNPACK <object_id>
  - Removes items from a container like a box or suitcase.
  - Example: UNPACK device_1

UNPLUG <object_id>
  - Unplugs a device from a power outlet or port.
  - Example: UNPLUG device_1

== Agent-Specific Actions (Tools Required) ==
REPAIR <object_id>

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.

DECOMPRESS <object_id>
  - Allows a compressed object to return to its normal size.

=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

DECOMPRESS <object_id>
  - Allows a compressed object to return to its normal size.
  - Example: DECOMPRESS device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.
  - Example: OPEN device_1

PAIR <object_id>
  - Establishes a wireless connection (e.g., Bluetooth) with another device.
  - Example: PAIR device_1

PLUG_IN <object_id>
  - Plugs a device into a power outlet or port.
  - Example: PLUG_IN device_1

TURN_OFF <object_id>
  - Turns off a device.
  - Example: TURN_OFF device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

UNMUTE <object_id>
  - Restores sound to a muted device.
  - Example: UNMUTE device_1

UNPACK <object_id>
  - Removes items from a container like a box or suitcase.
  - Example: UNPACK device_1

UNPLUG <object_id>
  - Unplugs a device from a power outlet or port.
  - Example: UNPLUG device_1

== Agent-Specific Actions (Tools Required) ==
REPAIR <object_id>
  - Repairs a broken object, requires a repair kit or specific tools.
  - Example: REPAIR device_1

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

DECOMPRESS <object_id>
  - Allows a compressed object to return to its normal size.
  - Example: DECOMPRESS device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.
  - Example: OPEN device_1

UNPACK <object_id>

UNPLUG <object_id>
  - Unplugs a device from a power outlet or port.

=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

DECOMPRESS <object_id>
  - Allows a compressed object to return to its normal size.
  - Example: DECOMPRESS device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.
  - Example: OPEN device_1

  - Establishes a wireless connection (e.g., Bluetooth) with another device.
  - Example: PAIR device_1

PLUG_IN <object_id>
  - Plugs a device into a power outlet or port.
  - Example: PLUG_IN device_1

  - Turns off a device.
  - Example: TURN_OFF device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

UNMUTE <object_id>
  - Restores sound to a muted device.
  - Example: UNMUTE device_1

UNPACK <object_id>
  - Removes items from a container like a box or suitcase.
  - Example: UNPACK device_1

UNPLUG <object_id>
  - Unplugs a device from a power outlet or port.
  - Example: UNPLUG device_1

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object

  - Pick up an object that is nearby

CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.

  - Allows a compressed object to return to its normal size.
  - Example: DECOMPRESS device_1

  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.

  - Example: OPEN device_1

  - Establishes a wireless connection (e.g., Bluetooth) with another device.
  - Example: PAIR device_1

PLUG_IN <object_id>
  - Plugs a device into a power outlet or port.
  - Example: PLUG_IN device_1

TURN_OFF <object_id>
  - Turns off a device.
  - Example: TURN_OFF device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

UNMUTE <object_id>
  - Restores sound to a muted device.
  - Example: UNMUTE device_1

UNPACK <object_id>
  - Removes items from a container like a box or suitcase.
  - Example: UNPACK device_1

UNPLUG <object_id>
  - Unplugs a device from a power outlet or port.
  - Example: UNPLUG device_1

== Agent-Specific Actions (Tools Required) ==
REPAIR <object_id>
  - Repairs a broken object, requires a repair kit or specific tools.
  - Example: REPAIR device_1

=== END OF ACTIONS ===

You are an intelligent agent tasked with performing tasks in a virtual environment. Please complete my tasks as efficiently as possible. You need to output your thoughts and the next action to be executed in the specified format, based on the task description, environmental status, and historical action information.

You only need to explore once. Do not perform repetitive explorations.

Please strictly follow the output format and do not include any other content!

Your output format is as follows:
Thought: <the reason why you are taking this action>
Action: <action command>

Example:
Thought: No objects have been found in the current room. I need to explore the current room first.
Action: EXPLORE


=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

DECOMPRESS <object_id>
  - Allows a compressed object to return to its normal size.
  - Example: DECOMPRESS device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.
  - Example: OPEN device_1

PAIR <object_id>
  - Establishes a wireless connection (e.g., Bluetooth) with another device.
  - Example: PAIR device_1

PLUG_IN <object_id>
  - Plugs a device into a power outlet or port.
  - Example: PLUG_IN device_1

TURN_OFF <object_id>
  - Turns off a device.
  - Example: TURN_OFF device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

UNMUTE <object_id>
  - Restores sound to a muted device.
  - Example: UNMUTE device_1

UNPACK <object_id>
  - Removes items from a container like a box or suitcase.
  - Example: UNPACK device_1

UNPLUG <object_id>
  - Unplugs a device from a power outlet or port.
  - Example: UNPLUG device_1

== Agent-Specific Actions (Tools Required) ==
REPAIR <object_id>
  - Repairs a broken object, requires a repair kit or specific tools.
  - Example: REPAIR device_1

=== END OF ACTIONS ===

The Engineering Hub (type: workspace) is the most probable location for these objects. I will move there to continue the search.

Action: EXPLORE
   Execution Result: ActionStatus.SUCCESS - robot_1 thoroughly explored Engineering Hub and discovered 18 new objects
4. Thought: The sensitive documents are located on the collaboration table in the Engineering Hub, and the black shredder (document_shredder_1) is also in this room. I need to grab the documents first, then use the shredder to shred them.

Action: GOTO collaboration_table_1
   Execution Result: ActionStatus.SUCCESS - robot_1 approached Collaboration Table (in Engineering Hub)
5. Thought: I am currently at the collaboration table in the Engineering Hub. The sensitive documents (sensitive_documents_1) are on this table and need to be shredded using the black shredder (document_shredder_1). First, I must grab the documents to carry them to the shredder.

Action: GRAB sensitive_documents_1
   Execution Result: ActionStatus.SUCCESS - robot_1 successfully grabbed Sensitive Documents
6. Thought: I am currently holding the sensitive documents and need to shred them using the document shredder (ID: document_shredder_1). The shredder is located in the Engineering Hub but not at my current location (collaboration table). I must first move to the shredder's location to use it.

Action: GOTO document_shredder_1

7. Thought: I am currently at the document_shredder_1 in the Engineering Hub, holding the sensitive_documents_1. The shredder provides the "shred" ability and matches the task description of a "black shredder" (brand: Fellowes, color: black). To complete the task, I need to shred the held documents using this shredder.

Action: PLACE sensitive_documents_1 in document_shredder_1
   Execution Result: ActionStatus.INVALID - Target location Document Shredder does not support 'in' placement
8. Thought: The shredder does not support placing items "in" it. The shredder provides the "shred" ability, so I need to directly use the shredder on the documents I'm holding. Since there is no explicit SHRED action, I should try to activate the shredder's function by turning it on while holding the documents, as turning on the device might enable its shredding capability.

   Execution Result: ActionStatus.INVALID - Object does not support turn_on operation (missing is_on attribute)
9. Thought: The shredder does not support placing items "in" it, and turning it on is invalid as it lacks an on/off state. Since the shredder provides the "shred" ability and the task requires shredding the documents, I need to use the shredder's functionality directly by interacting with it while holding the documents.

=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

DECOMPRESS <object_id>
  - Allows a compressed object to return to its normal size.
  - Example: DECOMPRESS device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.
  - Example: OPEN device_1

PAIR <object_id>
  - Establishes a wireless connection (e.g., Bluetooth) with another device.
  - Example: PAIR device_1

PLUG_IN <object_id>
  - Plugs a device into a power outlet or port.
  - Example: PLUG_IN device_1

TURN_OFF <object_id>
  - Turns off a device.
  - Example: TURN_OFF device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

UNMUTE <object_id>
  - Restores sound to a muted device.
  - Example: UNMUTE device_1

UNPACK <object_id>
  - Removes items from a container like a box or suitcase.
  - Example: UNPACK device_1

UNPLUG <object_id>
  - Unplugs a device from a power outlet or port.
  - Example: UNPLUG device_1

== Agent-Specific Actions (Tools Required) ==
REPAIR <object_id>
  - Repairs a broken object, requires a repair kit or specific tools.
  - Example: REPAIR device_1

=== END OF ACTIONS ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>

CLOSE <object_id>

UNPLUG <object_id>
  - Unplugs a device from a power outlet or port.

You are an intelligent agent tasked with performing tasks in a virtual environment. Please complete my tasks as efficiently as possible. You need to output your thoughts and the next action to be executed in the specified format, based on the task description, environmental status, and historical action information.

You only need to explore once. Do not perform repetitive explorations.

Please strictly follow the output format and do not include any other content!

Your output format is as follows:
Thought: <the reason why you are taking this action>
Action: <action command>

Example:
Thought: No objects have been found in the current room. I need to explore the current room first.
Action: EXPLORE


=== SUPPORTED ACTIONS FOR AGENT_1 ===

== Basic Actions ==
GOTO <object_id>
  - Move to a specific location or object
  - Example: GOTO main_workbench_area

GRAB <object_id>
  - Pick up an object that is nearby
  - Example: GRAB cup_1

PLACE <object_id> <in|on> <container_id>
  - Place a held object into or onto another object
  - Example: PLACE cup_1 on table_1

EXPLORE
  - Explore current room to discover objects
  - Example: EXPLORE

DONE
  - Finish the task
  - Example: DONE

== Attribute Actions (No Tools Required) ==
CLOSE <object_id>
  - Closes an object that is currently open.
  - Example: CLOSE device_1

DECOMPRESS <object_id>
  - Allows a compressed object to return to its normal size.
  - Example: DECOMPRESS device_1

OPEN <object_id>
  - Opens a container, door, or object that can be opened.
  - Example: OPEN device_1

PAIR <object_id>
  - Establishes a wireless connection (e.g., Bluetooth) with another device.
  - Example: PAIR device_1

PLUG_IN <object_id>
  - Plugs a device into a power outlet or port.
  - Example: PLUG_IN device_1

TURN_OFF <object_id>
  - Turns off a device.
  - Example: TURN_OFF device_1

TURN_ON <object_id>
  - Turns on a device.
  - Example: TURN_ON device_1

UNMUTE <object_id>
  - Restores sound to a muted device.
  - Example: UNMUTE device_1

UNPACK <object_id>
  - Removes items from a container like a box or suitcase.
  - Example: UNPACK device_1

UNPLUG <object_id>
  - Unplugs a device from a power outlet or port.
  - Example: UNPLUG device_1

== Agent-Specific Actions (Tools Required) ==
REPAIR <object_id>
  - Repairs a broken object, requires a repair kit or specific tools.
  - Example: REPAIR device_1

=== END OF ACTIONS ===
